title: How do I export contacts to other phones using storage media?
answer:
Step 1 Export the contact information on the phone to the internal storage in vCard format. Go to Files in the root directory of the phone's internal storage and transfer the exported .vcf file to the other phone.

Step 1 Select the .vcf file on the other phone to import the contact information.

If the phone supports an external microSD card, a microSD card is already inserted and the default storage location is set to SD card, you can transfer contacts using the microSD card.

Step 1 Export the contact information on the phone to the microSD card in vCard format.

Step 1 Unmount the microSD card and remove it before inserting it into the other phone.

Step 1 Go to Files in the root directory of the microSD card and select the exported .vcf file to import contact information to the phone.
keywords: microSD card, storage, contacts, address book, logs, import, export
